ValidationRule.description: If the associated Account Requires a PO , PO# needs to be filled in to close/win the opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR(Text(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) <> 'Signed Awaiting Survey Approval', Text(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) <> 'Signed'), OR((Text(StageName)='Signed'), (TEXT(StageName)='Signed Awaiting Survey Approval')), ISPICKVAL(Account.PO_Required_for_Orders__c, 'PO Required Before'), ISBLANK( PO_Number__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in Purchase Order Number(PO#) field to close win this Opportunity.
